com.stepstone.stepper.adapter

Interface StepAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFragmentStepAdapter, AbstractStepAdapter

    public interface StepAdapter
    Interface to be used as model to StepperLayout.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Step createStep(int position)
      Create each step of the StepperLayout.
      Step findStep(int position)
      Finds the given step without creating it.
      int getCount()
      Get the step count.
      android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter getPagerAdapter()
      Method for internal purpose.
      StepViewModel getViewModel(int position)
      Returns the view information to be used to display the step.

    • Method Detail

      • createStep

        Step createStep(int position)
        Create each step of the StepperLayout.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the PagerAdapter to be used inside the ViewPager.
        Returns:
        the step to be used inside the StepperLayout.

      • findStep

        Step findStep(int position)
        Finds the given step without creating it.
        Parameters:
        position - step position
        Returns:
        step fragment
        See Also:
        FragmentPagerAdapter.makeFragmentName(int, long)

      • getViewModel

        @NonNull
StepViewModel getViewModel(int position)
        Returns the view information to be used to display the step.
        Parameters:
        position - step position
        Returns:
        view information

      • getCount

        int getCount()
        Get the step count.
        Returns:
        the quantity of steps

      • getPagerAdapter

        android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter getPagerAdapter()
        Method for internal purpose. Should not be inherited.
        Returns:
        the adapter to be used in the ViewPager.
